website_summaries.verdict: Although this printer paper is thinner than other options on our short list, it's worth it for consumers who like the fact that it's made from recycled paper.
pros: Stands out from competitors for being made with 30% recycled materials
Works with laser and inkjet printers and other office equipment
Available in single or multiple reams
cons: Paper is thin, so it may not work for all printing tasks

customer_reviews.title: Like normal paper, only it's Amazon paper!
customer_reviews.text: This paper works just like other paper you may have purchased in the past. However, it's Amazon paper, which makes it sooo much better. From the moment I opened the box, I knew something was different. Yes, I noticed the regular paper smell, but I felt there was something bigger going on here and it sent a chill of excitement down my spine. I actually think my printer sang, when I opened a ream and placed it in the paper cartridge. Seriously, every day has been a bit better, since I purchased this Amazon paper. I encourage you to get your own and see for yourself. You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: JulieKT

customer_reviews.title: Decent, but too thin for editing
customer_reviews.text: The paper works if all you want to do is print, but it is painfully thin. Writing with most pens will bleed through to the other side. This is even true of highlighters, and the text on the page, to some extent.
customer_reviews.author: Gabe V. Appleton

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly thin paper
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this wondering how you could go wrong with paper but this paper is annoyingly thin. It sounds like a strange complaint for cheap printer paper, but it is so exceptionally thin that it is worth docking a star.
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: Terrible packaging, thin paper
customer_reviews.text: Lid of box was breaking in 3 corners, taped beyond belief. All the outer wrapping for the stack of paper was open, glue did not stick together to close package causing all the paper to fall out when removed from box. All packaging was absolutely terrible, paper itself was decent but on the thinner side
customer_reviews.author: Carly D.

customer_reviews.title: I would think twice after receiving this item
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two reams of paper and both arrived wide open. I have no idea if paper was lost along the way but an open ream of paper is not easy to store cleanly. Yes, I could have returned it but not worth my time. You would think and actual Amazon product would arrive in one piece.
customer_reviews.author: Mbsellssd

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: This paper works well in my printer. I gave it a 4 star rating because the packaging was poor. I bought a 3 pack and alll three packs the glue didn't hold on the wrapping so i had to fold and tape them back one pack was loose in the box but I just used that one first. All in all good paper for the buck..I will buy again hopefully the will correct the packaging
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done better than cheep copy paper.
customer_reviews.text: Its not Hammermill but better that cheap copy paper, so some compromise on quality. The Paper is a nice white for school and home use. I would probably upgrade for business presentation use or anything you want high quality on. Good paper decent price.
customer_reviews.author: Scorpio

customer_reviews.title: Great Price for Quality Paper! Exceptional for Inkjet Printing!
customer_reviews.text: Vivid bright white paper, perfect for letters and even serves well for full-color flyer prints. Thickness is not so thick that it feels of cardstock but thick enough that printing on both sides doesn't bleed through. Great price for quality paper!
customer_reviews.author: GraphFX Creations

customer_reviews.title: I like the box it came in... So cute, small and compact! Fits just about anywhere.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the quickness of the delivery. Actually I love it! I like the amount I ordered because the box fits right under my printer. It's small and compact making it easier to make it fit anywhere. My son's in college and he has his own printer and uses it more than I use my printer. The paper is great, doesn't get stuck. Not paper jams on my HP printer or my son's Canon.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia O'neal

customer_reviews.title: It came from a tree.
customer_reviews.text: This was a tree. A special tree. A tree with the potential to be a great tree. One day some guys came and cut this tree down and made the bestest paper ever. This paper asks for nothing, this paper doesn't cheat on you with other paper. This paper is faithful and honest. This paper has a story and it is up to us to spread the word and tell people just how amazing this paper is and what type of life it has lived.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Clements

customer_reviews.title: poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Not what I would recommend. There are other companies with better prices. the recycled paper meant that the paper weight is low making the paper thinner and less quality.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal J.

customer_reviews.title: too thin
customer_reviews.text: Have tried on 2 different printers - thought it was my paper feeder and bought new printer - that one will not feed paper either....the paper is too thin - choose something better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good, dull paper.
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what it says on the label: printer paper that isn't glossy or shiny. It's worked just fine with my inexpensive printer and even has a good feel if you wind up writing on it with a pen - I've had no problems with it bleeding or smudging or anything like that.
customer_reviews.author: Kallah

customer_reviews.title: Good paper, bad wrapping
customer_reviews.text: The paper itself is fine, but it came wrapped like someone took several pieces of paper and taped them together to make the wrapping. I had to create a make-shift container to hold the paper.
customer_reviews.author: Leadership Ed

customer_reviews.title: Paper may have manufacture defect
customer_reviews.text: Even after fanning paper it jams in printer, was not cut with sharp enough slicer during manufacturing, rough edges
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: Terrible glue on packaging
customer_reviews.text: The paper is great. The package has such a small amount of glue, it was open and all over the inside of the box when I opened it. Didn’t care enough to take a photo. It’s much worse than 52 pickup for sure
customer_reviews.author: E G.

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Do I want to schlep to Office Depot to buy paper? Nope. Amazon's is just as good, or better, and with a 2 day Prime delivery, I can't argue. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: Stef

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Paper is just as good as any I have used very good quality highly recommend and also like the idea of having recycled paper just as good as regular printer paper.
customer_reviews.author: neil wilson III

customer_reviews.title: I am happy to say that I have no reason to worry. The paper quality is very good. I will buy again.
customer_reviews.text: After reading reviews indicating that the paper was thin and poor quality, I was hesitant to purchase this product but decided to do so because it was the lowest price ream of paper offered. I am glad to say that I had no reason to be concerned. The paper is good quality. It is not thick but it is not very thin either. The sheets of paper are consistent in size and perfect for every day use which is what I needed. I find that all AmazonBasics products that I have purchased have been of high quality at a great point. This one is no different. I will be purxhasing again.
customer_reviews.author: steven brannon

customer_reviews.title: Seems the same quality as non-recycled paper
customer_reviews.text: I got the 100% recycled paper and really like it. This paper looks and prints the same as non-recycled paper. So you might as well get this to maintain the planet. The people who say it jams their printer might just have bad printers or put too much in.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: High quality - Great value
customer_reviews.text: This paper is excellent in every way. Every AmazonBasics item I've bought has been well-priced and superior in quality - and the printer paper is no exception. When Amazon's name is on an item, I believe it receives more thorough inspection.
customer_reviews.author: tweetybird

customer_reviews.title: Thin paper
customer_reviews.text: See the back of the paper after printing by HP printer. A paper is very thin. Price isnt impressive either. I would expect ~$5 for a ream since this is amazon basic brand.
customer_reviews.author: noon

customer_reviews.title: Had a problem
customer_reviews.text: I feel bad for downing a star, but one of the pages had a hole in it about the size of... I don't know, Headphone jack? Still, a hole. Not even a top sheet, it was a few in.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Bowles

customer_reviews.title: Paper was creased and unusable
customer_reviews.text: Had to return these reams of paper. Every 10th paper in the ream had creases and was unusable for my printing jobs. Otherwise, paper is white, bright and has a heavy high quality feel to it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I use this paper to copy everything. It goes in printer nicely and has substance to it. I recommend this paper.
customer_reviews.author: lynn

customer_reviews.title: Not as described
customer_reviews.text: Package was not full of paper but 100 or so sheets of paper and random recycled materials -returned
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: More of a convenience purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I usually stock up at Staples, but was on call and could't get out, so I placed an order. The paper came quickly and it prints just as well as the Hammermill I usually get.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: My packages were open.
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the shipping box, the two packs of paper and a box of Cortisone I ordered were all open. The paper is fine, but I'm not sure if I should use the Cortisone because it could have been tampered with. I've never had this happen before.
customer_reviews.author: Petallic

customer_reviews.title: Recycled Copy Paper is great.
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived on time without damage to contents. Paper is good quality and does well in my HP Officejet 6700. Cheaper than similar quality paper from Costco.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Dangel

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I did a search for heavy paper and all I got was a regular cheap ream of white paper. It's worth $3.50
customer_reviews.author: Hope

customer_reviews.title: great value on recycled paper!
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that amazon offers recycled printer paper. It has no issues and is just as good as the stuff you buy at the store.
customer_reviews.author: j

customer_reviews.title: loose paper
customer_reviews.text: bought a ream of AmazonBasics copy paper with several other items. the paper had broken through its outer cover and ended up spread over other items. not happy with flimsy cover on paper!
customer_reviews.author: sally j. mason

customer_reviews.title: Packaging was loose
customer_reviews.text: The packaging for the ream arrived loose and the paper had been sliding around the box. It looked like there wasn't enough glue to secure the packaging. The paper was fine and only a few sheets were bent. But the packaging seems like a production issue worth fixing.
customer_reviews.author: Brian L

customer_reviews.title: Where has the paper been my entire life?
customer_reviews.text: When i opened the package, i was pleasantly surprised. The paper was white, flat, and smooth. You have those moments in life when you know something is missing. When the copy paper arrived, i knew my life was now complete. I am whole.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth P.

customer_reviews.title: Good but thin
customer_reviews.text: this is thinner than standard copy paper but good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy M

customer_reviews.title: Great paper.
customer_reviews.text: Works great in my printer. Same as most 20 lb paper. good price.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy s.t.

customer_reviews.title: It's paper.  It works fine!
customer_reviews.text: Seems like decent enough paper, and I don't have to remember to stop at the office store... I can order with with two clicks as soon as I get close to running out. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Norman C.

customer_reviews.title: Smooth paper
customer_reviews.text: I really like this paper. I like the texture of it and it’s very smooth. I don’t however care for how thin it is. I would like it to be a little thicker.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Sexton

customer_reviews.title: White paper should be white
customer_reviews.text: ......and it is. Look...if paper is white, runs through my printer and the ink doesn't smear...it is good.
customer_reviews.author: Luacreskid

customer_reviews.title: Not the best value but convenient
customer_reviews.text: This paper was fine but it wasn’t a great price, especially For a store brand. I could have gotten two twice the paper of The Same quality for the price of this one at office max. It was Convenient though.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: No Good for Printing
customer_reviews.text: This paper is not good for printing. Ink constantly smears and corners always curl up going through printer. Constant paper jams and poor print quality. Not worth the $ you save. Buy higher quality paper. It's so bad I'm going to recycle what's left out of the pack :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No
customer_reviews.text: The box was bad- the paper around the paper was ripped & tattered. I would not buy again. .
customer_reviews.author: PP

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I don't have to leave my house and go across town to buy.
customer_reviews.author: e

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the $
customer_reviews.text: Used for home office printer. Good quality paper at a great price. A+
customer_reviews.author: grahamgg

customer_reviews.title: An outrage and overprice of the items
customer_reviews.text: This is a deceived tactic of getting customer to buy a simple 500 sheets of white paper for $14.23. At first, I thought that it would contain 5000 sheets, but actually it has only 500 sheets that I can go to any office supply store to buy for $3~$4 per ream. Again, this is a scam that everyone should stay away.
customer_reviews.author: T H

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Thin paper but does the job and good price for a 3 pk case
customer_reviews.author: Ann B.

customer_reviews.title: Just okay.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty cheap quality... has a bit of a crinkly appearance.
customer_reviews.author: Concerned City-zen

customer_reviews.title: It works very very well.
customer_reviews.text: Very good paper. I would recommend to family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: Edgar B

customer_reviews.title: Good thickness
customer_reviews.text: Great printer paper. Not too thin (which happens sometimes when you buy paper online) and not too thick.
customer_reviews.author: Ro

customer_reviews.title: quality
customer_reviews.text: I like a quality paper even if I'm printing for myself. This one is good.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Edwards

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Very thin, I mean very thin. I wouldn't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: yvette beausoleil

customer_reviews.title: i love that i can get good paper sent to my ...
customer_reviews.text: i love that i can get good paper sent to my door for a good price without driving all the way out to a store.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: good value
customer_reviews.text: just like the more expensive papers - I use it in my laser printer and never a problem
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: quality
customer_reviews.text: great weighted paper, always clean and in perfect condition. love that it partially sources recycled items as well.
customer_reviews.author: RcamG

customer_reviews.title: worst paper ever
customer_reviews.text: if you want the printer to jam all the time order this cheap paper. this paper will damage the printer since it has been jamming the printers. pay little more get better quality paper.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I like it it's not too thin like some paper. It works great for me.
customer_reviews.author: gina jennings

customer_reviews.title: Paper delivered a mess
customer_reviews.text: The paper looks fine but the reams were ripped wide opened for three separate reams and the paper was scattered all over the shipping box - makes it hard to store load into the printer.
customer_reviews.author: Ora R Sheinson

customer_reviews.title: If you don’t care
customer_reviews.text: This paper is “paper” thin on all accounts. This is not a good paper choice if you do double sided printing. Don’t bother trying to highlight anything on this paper either I’d you printed on both sides. The paper is thin and the quality is mediocre at best.
customer_reviews.author: norra.theexplorer

customer_reviews.title: Paper
customer_reviews.text: Decent price for not having to drive and get it. :)
customer_reviews.author: Teri

customer_reviews.title: Thin, poor packaging
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two reams. Says it is 20lb, but paper is thinner than the 20lb paper I already have at home. Both reams arrived with the packaging falling right off.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: BETTER OFFER PRICE
customer_reviews.text: I LIKED IT, AND REASONABLE PRICE IT LIKE ANY OTHER COPY PAPER
customer_reviews.author: Blanca

customer_reviews.title: Basic white printer paper
customer_reviews.text: No complaints, your basic white printer paper. Good quality for good price.
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: Good paper quality
customer_reviews.text: Got delivered to my door Love that Paper is good quality
customer_reviews.author: Taryen Shannon

customer_reviews.title: As good as any other copy paper + price!
customer_reviews.text: AmazonBasics copy paper is as good as you can find & esp for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Paper.
customer_reviews.text: It’s paper. Feels and looks like paper. Slightly thicker than normal paper maybe? Bright white.
customer_reviews.author: ambyrdelayne

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Amazon is ruining commerce but they have stuff that is cheap and it does what I need it to.
customer_reviews.author: zack

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent price and the quality is superior to other less expensive brands.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Massei

customer_reviews.title: Great recycled paper - good quality, bright white, just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I needed. Really nice quality for recycled paper.
customer_reviews.author: R. Sanborn

customer_reviews.title: It’s paper
customer_reviews.text: It’s paper; it’s a nice texture, works in a printer, and does what it needs to do.
customer_reviews.author: Maddi MTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Perfect office paper
customer_reviews.text: It’s paper, what can I say. Works well and came quickly!
customer_reviews.author: S Contreras

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Paper actually somehow stayed clean and didn’t become dusty after being left out in the open. Very nice and reliable product, but that’s what you can expect from amazon right.
customer_reviews.author: Andreas

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Paper was very high quality, but price entirely toooo high. I'll not by it again at this price.
customer_reviews.author: MollyB

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this
customer_reviews.text: This is ridiculous. I paid $14 for ONE PACK OF PAPER.
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: box  arrived ripped
customer_reviews.text: box came ripped on the side and as a result, the reams of paper were wet as the individual packages were exposed. I am not happy Gitty Bronstein
customer_reviews.author: G.B.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. Perfect for classroom printing.
customer_reviews.text: This package of paper will last me all year. (I'm a teacher) I print so much!
customer_reviews.author: Jessenia Zayas

customer_reviews.title: GREAT DEAL
customer_reviews.text: GREAT DEAL. JUST MAKE SURE YOUR DELIVERY PEOPLE DO NOT LEAVE PACKAGES SOAKING IN THE RAIN.
customer_reviews.author: CHASITY LYNN

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works for me - just like any other name brands.
customer_reviews.author: Vanya

customer_reviews.title: Recycled!
customer_reviews.text: A little thin, but I love that it is recycled.
customer_reviews.author: Natural Mom

customer_reviews.title: Good value for copy paper
customer_reviews.text: I just needed more copy paper for routine use. Combined with other purchase got free shipping. Saved me money and a trip to the store.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip

customer_reviews.title: Great printer paper
customer_reviews.text: It is great Pinter paper. Thick enough isn’t cheap looking prints nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Gebauer

customer_reviews.title: if you are not printing that much, order this one.
customer_reviews.text: good and cheap stuff :) if you are not printing that much, order this one.
customer_reviews.author: Zale

customer_reviews.title: I don't use a lot, however I'll reorder when I bergen to run out
customer_reviews.text: The reem of copy paper arrived on time, and works very well with my HP printer
customer_reviews.author: Hal

customer_reviews.title: Fully functional
customer_reviews.text: It's a box of printer paper. It functions as expected for a box of printer paper. The paper it contains is fully compatible with most printers and writing instruments.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Black

customer_reviews.title: That’s what she said
customer_reviews.text: This is no Dunder Mifflin paper, but it will do.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Product Came damaged, but usable
customer_reviews.text: The product was usable, but when it arrived in the box, a sizable number of papers were folded on the edges and not in their wrapping paper
customer_reviews.author: benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: Good buy, awesome quality, arrived on time and everything ok. Pretty happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 2nd time's the charm
customer_reviews.text: The first time I ordered this, it got lost. The second time I ordered it, it showed up! So there's that.
customer_reviews.author: CATheater

customer_reviews.title: Printer paper
customer_reviews.text: Item came on time. Quality is great. Will order again.

customer_reviews.title: paper
customer_reviews.text: all 3 packages were open in the box and so when i opened the box the paper went everywhere
customer_reviews.author: christina semeski

customer_reviews.text: The box only included 9 reams of paper instead of 10. Not worth returning because of the cost. DO NOT ORDER THIS!

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The packaging was all torn, most of the paper was all wrinkled that had to be thrown out.

customer_reviews.text: Paper was loosely packaged and came apart on opening the box

customer_reviews.title: read the fine print
customer_reviews.text: 1500 sheets for $28. I can get 10,000 sheets of same quality for $30.

customer_reviews.title: Open pack of paper
customer_reviews.text: *eye roll* not going to count but not sure it’s a full ream anymore.

customer_reviews.title: Paper arrived on time. The boxes for the paper ...
customer_reviews.text: Paper arrived on time. The boxes for the paper need to be stronger. A few came broken.
customer_reviews.author: DSoler

customer_reviews.title: Rec'd damaged
customer_reviews.text: Paper was dog-eared on the corner and just thrown in a big box to be banged up, otherwise it would have been fine.

customer_reviews.title: I like your Product. Thank you for asking!
customer_reviews.text: Hello from Washington! I like your product. Thank you for asking!

customer_reviews.title: It is cheap white paper... what did you expect?
customer_reviews.text: Everything I demand of this blank white copy paper delivers. good packaging, bright white, prints fine on HP Laser printer.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality

product_meta.title: AmazonBasics 30% Recycled Multipurpose Copy Printer Paper - 8.5 x 11 Inches, 1 Ream (500 Sheets)
product_meta.description: Size:1 Ream| Configuration:30% Recycled PaperAn Amazon Brand.
feature_bullets: 1 ream of letter-size 30% recycled multipurpose copy paper (500 sheets total)
Works with laser/inkjet printers, copiers, and fax machines
High-quality 20-pound weight for economical printing and resistance to paper jams
Bright white for better contrast; 92 GE brightness
Acid-free for long-lasting strength; made in the USA from imported materials; measures 8.5 by 11 inches

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars854 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
